title: Enhanced iteration status with gum interactivity
description: Consolidate ralph-live into main ralph command. Show live dashboard between iterations: progress bar, cost, time elapsed. Deprecate ralph-live (keep as alias to ralph-status). If gum available, allow keyboard toggles: [v]erbose output, [p]ause after iteration, [s]kip current story, [q]uit gracefully.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Show elapsed time since ralph started (e.g., '‚è± 12m 34s')
Show current story + model + iteration on one line
Compact: all status fits in 4-5 lines
If gum available, show keybind hints: [v]erbose [p]ause [s]kip [q]uit
[v] toggles showing full claude output vs summary only
[p] pauses after current iteration for review
[s] skips current story, moves to next
[q] finishes current iteration then exits gracefully
Works without gum (just no interactive controls)
Deprecate ralph-live: make it alias to ralph-status with note
